thread.section_title: dietDirect Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of dietDirect | www.dietdirect.com
thread.title: Angela Bauer

author: Angela Bauer
title: Angela Bauer
text: I buy the Wonderslim Aspartame Free shakes. Each one has a good taste, which makes losing weight so much easier. I have been a customer for over four years. The website is easy to navigate. There are different ways to save, which helps out everyone. Sign up for their emails to receive even more sales coupons. Love the taste! Love the company that offers good products at reasonable prices! Thanks, Dietdirect.com
